thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Anhui Jianghuai Automobile's Controlling Shareholder To Increase Shareholdings

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Anhui Jianghuai Automobile's Controlling Shareholder To Increase Shareholdings

organizations.name: reuters) - anhui jianghuai automobile group corp ltd

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group Corp Ltd :
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER PLANS TO INCREASE SHAREHOLDINGS IN THE COMPANY BY UP TO 200 MILLION YUAN ($31.60 million) BETWEEN FEB 13 AND DEC 31 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2Ha0XAz Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3283 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
